comments.author: Healix.5819
comments.body:
Cliff Spradlin.3512:

OK, I talked to the designer in charge of that map, and she told me that it’s just a bug. It’s supposed to have text but doesn’t. I filed a bug for it to get text at some point in the future. It’ll probably take a while for it to be fixed since the text has to be written and go through localization and testing.

In case you were curious, the event is related to the Font of Rhand boss.

Thanks for the report!

comments.author: HeroDark.8970
comments.body:
“Event ID [6BD7C8B0-2605-4819-9AE6-EF2849098090]”

I just wanted to report you this lack in terms of data returned by the following JSON call:
https://api.guildwars2.com/v1/event_names.json

If you try to search this event ID “6BD7C8B0-2605-4819-9AE6-EF2849098090” into the returned JSON data, you’ll note that this event has not the name property well setted (even better, an empty string).
